@graph.name: Vegan Onion Rings - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: You are going to love these vegan onion rings! They are incredibly easy to make, crispy, and delicious. Plus, they are oven-baked and healthier!

@graph.headline: Vegan Onion Rings
@graph.keywords: can you freeze onion rings,can you reheat onion rings,how to make vegan onion rings,vegan baked onion rings,vegan onion rings

@graph.name: Vegan Onion Rings
@graph.description: You are going to love these vegan onion rings! They are incredibly easy to make, crispy, and delicious. Plus, they are oven baked, which makes them so much healthier than fried onion rings!

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the all-purpose flour, garlic powder, smoked paprika powder, nutritional yeast, salt, and unsweetened almond milk in a bowl and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the all-purpose flour, garlic powder, smoked paprika powder, nutritional yeast, salt, and unsweetened almond milk in a bowl and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the onions and cut them into about 1/4 inch rings. Carefully separate the rings from each other.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the onions and cut them into about 1/4 inch rings. Carefully separate the rings from each other.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a bowl with panko flakes. Coat each onion ring in the flour spice mixture. Then coat it in the panko flakes afterwards.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a bowl with panko flakes. Coat each onion ring in the flour spice mixture. Then coat it in the panko flakes afterwards.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the onion rings on top. Preheat the oven to 350 °F and bake them for 20 minutes. Flip them after 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and place the onion rings on top. Preheat the oven to 350 °F and bake them for 20 minutes. Flip them after 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately with ketchup or dip of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately with ketchup or dip of choice.

@graph.keywords: how to make vegan onion rings, vegan onion ring recipe, vegan onion rings
